Write-Up Text: People on social media are buzzing with excitement and news about the upcoming Australian budget. Some posts revealed exciting news for jobseekers with older individuals set to receive higher welfare payments than their younger counterparts. Meanwhile other posts dealt with criticisms and concerns around potential changes to franking credits or inadequate support for other groups. Despite some disagreement others showed optimism for the budget's potential to provide cost-of-living relief and support for those who need it most.
